extensionDescription.message: Detect if websites you browse are hosted by Clever Cloud.

pageActionTitleIfYesWithZone.message: This website is hosted by Clever Cloud (zone = $ZONE$)
pageActionTitleIfYesWithZone.description: Content of the address bar icon's tooltip if a website is hosted by Clever Cloud and we know on which zone

pageActionTitleIfYesBecauseOwned.message: This website is hosted by Clever Cloud (they own the domain)
pageActionTitleIfYesBecauseOwned.description: Content of the address bar icon's tooltip if a website is hosted by Clever Cloud and we do not know on which zone

pageActionTitleIfNo.message: This website is probably not hosted by Clever Cloud
pageActionTitleIfNo.description: Content of the address bar icon's tooltip if a website is not hosted by Clever Cloud
